description:
Awesome new user interface designed to work optimally on iOS 8!

“Fotor is offering quick and easy scenes and adjustments.” – BBC
“Fotor handles pretty much every photo editing task you'd need” - Lifehacker 
“The app worked as expected without any glitches” - TUAW

With enhanced camera, powerful photo editing tools and tons of classic & magazine collage templates, you can make your images even more awesome than before!

Features:
【Enhanced Camera】 
-Six photo-taking modes, with features like Grid, Big Button, Burst, Timer, Stabilizer, and Square.

【Photo Editor 】
-Spruce up photos with one–tap enhances.

-13 different scenes options to match the conditions when took the photo.

-Over one hundred filters & effects, plus you can apply multiple effects to each photo! 

-Adjust Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness

-Modify your photos with advanced tools like Vignette, Shadows, Highlights, Temp, Tint, RGB and Curve adjustments. 

-Add text and captions. Change font style, color and alignment. Resize, Rotate and modify the opacity of your pictures to make your images even more dynamic.

-Make photos pop with stickers and frames.

-Strengthen the depth of images with tilt-shift.

-Pixelate image content with new pixel brush feature 

【Collage 】
Classic: Use up to 9 photos in your collage; Choose from tons of awesome templates.

Magazine: Make a collage with exciting built-in magazine templates.

【Discover】
You can check out awesome #fotor masterpieces and see what kind of cool events and contests we are having.

We now support English, German, French, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Thai, Vietnamese, Turkish, Indonesian, Arabic and are actively working on lots more languages!

Share your awesome creation to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Line or other platforms of your choice.

Following us：

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/fotor_apps
Twitter: https://twitter.com/fotor_com

artistName: Chengdu Everimaging Science and Technology Co., Ltd

releaseNotes:
1.4:3 and 3:4 collage ratio options have returned
2.Optimized for iPhone 6 & iPhone 6 Plus
3.Optimized Camera Speed
4.Improved Interface Interaction
5.Improved Performance in Effects & Frames Modes
6.Now Allows Two Finger Rotation of Stickers
7.Fixed Some Bugs
